name: CBS: Desolation
summary: Build, defend your sanctum, gather resources and survive in this post apocalyptic simulated survivor

name: CBM Draw Poker
summary: Poker game for the PET/CBM (C) Commodore 1978

name: CB Chara Wars: Ushinawareta Gag
summary: CB Chara Wars is an Action game, developed by Almanic Corp. and published by Banpresto, which was released in Japan in 1992.

name: CBT With Yuuka Kazami: Getting Help With Patchouli Knowledge
summary: You decide to seek out someone who's been looking for you, that person is none other than Patchouli Knowledge! She seems to have a surprise prepared, but what could it be?

name: CBS: Escape from the Mall 3D
summary: Escape the mall, don't let the cargo stop you on your way!

name: C.B.T
summary: C.B.T (Crazy Ball Time) is a ball-rolling platformer, with crazy tough action, and even crazier Balls.

name: C-Beams
summary: Pilot your ship through a perilous black hole system in this Space Action RPG. Engage in advanced ship combat, haul rare elements, and upgrade your vessel to survive. Stunning visuals, a deep narrative, and a rewarding progression system await as you uncover the abyss's dark secrets.

name: CBO TD
summary: CBO TD is a build your own maze tower defense. Protect your castle from hordes of mobs with different classes of towers.

name: CBeebies Playtime Island: Game
summary:
CBeebies Playtime Island is full of free games for children, itâ€™s safe, fun and kids can play offline with their favourite CBeebies friends.

The games in this fun kids app encourage learning through play with CBeebies favourites, Hey Duggee, JoJo & Gran Gran, Shaun the Sheep, Love Monster, Go Jetters, Swashbuckle, Peter Rabbit, Bing, Octonauts, Teletubbies, Mr Tumble and more.

name: CBT With Yuuka Kazami
summary: Cognitive Behavioral Therapy, also known as CBT, is the use of evidence based strategies to help manage symptoms of poor mental health problems such as stress, anxiety and depression. Yuuka Kazami from the Touhou Project invites you to some mostly peaceful lessons where you grasp the basics of CBT!
